title: How to create project using AIDE Assistant?
body:
•Click on the FAB(+) in the bottom right corner,
•Choose a tamplate you want to use for your project,
•Provide required informations,
•Click on the 'Create Project' button below.

title: How to create new Activity, Service, Content Provider or Broadcast receiver?
body:
•Open project details page,
•Click on the plus(+) FAB on the bottom right corner,
•Select what you want to create,
•Provide required informations,
•Click on 'Create' button.

title: How to add permissions or dependency?
body:
•Open project details page,
•Click on the plus(+) FAB on the bottom right corner,
•Select Permission or Dependency what you want,
•Mark your required permissions or dependency,
•Click on the bottom right FAB.

title: How to add vector asset to an existing project?
body:
•Open drawable folder under res directory,
•Click on the plus(+) FAB,
•Click on 'New Drawable',
•Then click on 'Vector Drawable',
•Click on your desired Vector Asset, you can search also,
•Customize according to your need,
•Click on the 'Import' button.
